column6: "OLD MAN LOGAN" Part 4 (of 8) In a future where America is dominated by super-villains, old man Logan lives out his days, but as far as he's concerned, WOLVERINE died 50 years ago with the other heroes. Plus: the identity of the PRESIDENT revealed!
column8: | other:Chris Eliopoulos | colorist:Morry Hollowell | penciller:Steve McNiven | writer:Mark Millar | letterer:Cory Petit | inker:Dexter Vines
